column5:
Merge pull request #62 from dchohfi/master

#61 fixing bug when rendering on iOS7
#61 fixing bug when rendering on iOS7, text on segment control wasn't showing

Merge pull request #57 from hijackwang/patch-1

Update KNSemiModalViewController.podspec

Update KNSemiModalViewController.podspec

update podspec version to 0.4

Merge pull request #45 from kasperpihl/master

Added possibility to update background

Merge pull request #49 from bartvandendriessche/AddParentScaleOption

Add option to configure the scale the parent should animate towards

Merge pull request #54 from RafaelAlba/update-how-modal-and-overlay-views-are-retrieved

Using objectAtIndex proved to be too brittle when modal contained a MapView

Merge pull request #55 from opedge/master

Added the ability to add custom background view instead of boring solid black background

relying on modal and overlay being at a specific index in the array of subviews was too brittle, especially when the modal contains a MapView. The MapView adds two extra layers which throws off the indexing of the subviews
Remove superfluous call to CATransform3DScale which caused duplicate scaling
Add option to configure the scale the parent should animate towards
Add explicit instruction on how to dismiss the semi-modal
Store the presenting controller. Easier way to dismiss the semi-modal right from child controller
Code clean up, no new functionality
More comprehensive code for storing keys

Update README.md

Update instruction for adding framework

Merge pull request #33 from escherba/endcontext2

End image context after capturing screenshot
End image context after capturing screenshot

Merge pull request #31 from mRs-/master

Clean Up for Landscape Shadow Support
Removed the shadow path for better landscape support
Remove the Podspec out of the repository. This don't belong in here and is a part of the CocoaPods Specs and not the project itself.

Update README.md

Updated the README with new informations about the optional parameters. And the known Issues.
Update minimum SDK to 5.0 and update README

API-breaking: add dismissBlock parameter to -presentSemiViewController:… method.

The dismiss block is called when the user dismisses the semi-modal view by tapping the dimmed parent/background view.
Add option for alternative transition styles: SlideUp (default), FadeInOut, FadeIn, FadeOut.

Exclude modal view from screenshot.

Fixes visible modal view when reducing its height after rotation.
More descriptive CGRect variable names. Add missing autoresizing mask to dismiss button.
Keep semi-modal view anchored at the bottom of the parent view.
Support rotation. When the device orientation changes, retake screenshot of underlying parent controller's view.

Add option for *not* traversing the parentViewController chain.

This allows us to handle unwind segues in the custom view controller container, instead of its nav/tabbar/etc controller.
Fix bug that sometimes caused the modal view to dismiss to the side instead of down when in landscape orientation.

Merge pull request #21 from lexrus/master

Avoid NSRangeException while resizing and dismissing the modal view in the same time.
Avoid NSRangeException while resizing and dismissing the modal view in the same time.

Extract options/defaults handling to separate category, included from https://github.com/yangmeyer/YMFoundationAdditions

See http://blog.yangmeyer.de/blog/2012/10/08/an-options-slash-defaults-pattern/
Properly implement view controller containment, i.e. now calls the view appearance methods.
Add podspec file to support cocoapods
Add optional completion block to dismiss method.
Support landscape interface orientation by using target view's bounds instead of frame (being the root view, it is transformed by the rotation).
Make modal shadow opacity configurable through options dictionary.
Make parent view's alpha configurable through options dictionary.
Make animation duration configurable through options dictionary.
Allow disabling the push-parent-back effect. Introduce options dictionary that will allow configuring other parameters.
This shouldn't be here in the first place
Move notification to 2nd demo, keep the 1st one super simple
Adding notification to all the events: show, hide and resize.
Fixing when the nextResponder is an UITabBarController, used on resize button.
Setting timingFunction on the second CABasicAnimation

Merge pull request #10 from lexrus/master

Should resize dismissButton as well.

Merge pull request #9 from lexrus/master

Add a new method to resize semi-modal view (could use for handling text input)
Fixed a typo and updated a screenshot.
It's now resizable after the animation.

Merge pull request #8 from dlackty/shadow-path

Use Shadow path for much better performance
Use CALayer's shadow path for much better performance.
Make CALayer rasterized for better performance.

Merge pull request #4 from AlejandroJL/master

Support Retina Display

Merge pull request #2 from zhangyichix/patch-1

Rename misleading variable name
Demo using .xib and correct way to call dismiss on container VC
Use transparent button instead of UITapGestureRecognizer
